body_html: I want to notice, that after doing tf.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=True, log_device_placement=True) it does actually choose the device you specify (gpu_n) without "no supported kernel for GPU devices is available" error.
body_text: I want to notice, that after doing tf.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=True, log_device_placement=True) it does actually choose the device you specify (gpu_n) without "no supported kernel for GPU devices is available" error.
body: I want to notice, that **after doing** `tf.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=True, log_device_placement=True)` it **does actually choose the device you specify** (`gpu_n`) without "no supported kernel for GPU devices is available" error.
